pages.title: Functional Blocks
pages.text: Practical fixtures that support rituals, brewing, farming, storage—and a bit of spooky ambience.

pages.title: Dreamcatcher
pages.text: Burns phantoms within ~16 blocks when placed, protecting your base at night. Its aura draws on $(l:hexalia:resources/elemental_nodes)Fire Node$(/l).

pages.title: Shelf
pages.text: Potion shelf with multiple slots; each slot stores up to 6 bottles. Ideal for organizing $(l:hexalia:content/brews)Brews$(/l) and quick access during adventuring.

pages.title: Rustic Oven
pages.text: Gentle heat source used to warm mixtures—perfect companion for Small Cauldrons when preparing $(l:hexalia:content/brews)brews$(/l).

pages.title: Infused Dirt
pages.text: Crafted from Dirt and Siren Kelp. Allows planting of $(l:hexalia:resources/herbs)Herbs$(/l); bone mealing herbs here can duplicate them for sustainable harvesting.

pages.title: Infused Farmland
pages.text: Made by hoeing Infused Dirt. Never needs water, doesn’t dehydrate, and isn’t trampled by players. Supports Sugar Cane and Saltsprout without their usual requirements; shovel to revert.

pages.title: Candle Skull
pages.text: Combine a Candle with any Skull for a moody light source. Light with Flint & Steel; right-click to extinguish. The Wither variant burns with eerie blue flame.
